Package library.domain

Class Book

java.lang.Object
library.domain.Book
public class Book extends Object
Represents a physical book in the library system.

A Book contains basic bibliographic information and a flag indicating whether it is currently borrowed. This class is part of the Domain Layer and is used by multiple sprints including:

  • Sprint 1 – Book management and search functionality
  • Sprint 2 – Borrowing and overdue detection
  • Sprint 5 – Mixed media handling
Instances of this class are persisted using BookRepository.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lojain
